General.Name: Elevate Uranium Ltd
General.Description: Elevate Uranium Ltd engages in the exploration and evaluation of uranium deposits. The company's principal projects include the Koppies, Hirabeb, Marenica, and Namib IV in Namibia. It also holds 100% interests in the Angela, Thatcher Soak, Oobagooma, and Minerva project areas, as well as the Bigrlyi, Malawiri, Walbiri, and Areva joint ventures in Australia. The company was formerly known as Marenica Energy Limited and changed its name to Elevate Uranium Ltd in May 2021. Elevate Uranium Ltd was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in West Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 5 Ord Street, West Perth, WA, Australia, 6005
